4.eng-name: The Book On The Mosques And The Congregations

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'I was thinking of commanding that the call to prayer be given, then I would tell a man to lead the people in prayer, then I would go out with some other men carrying bundles of wood, and go to people who do not attend the prayer, and burn their houses down around them

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّغْلِيظِ فِي التَّخَلُّفِ عَنِ الْجَمَاعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Severe warning Against Missing Prayer In Congregation
